## Overview

In this hands-on exercise, I will handle geospatial data in R by using appropriate R packages such as **sf**.

## Getting Started

The code chunk below install and load **sf** and **tidyverse** packages into R environment.

```{r}
pacman::p_load(sf, tidyverse)

```

## Import Geospatial Data

### Import polygon feature data

```{r}
mpsz = st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", 
                  layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")
```
